1-basic-house.title: Basic House
text: The basic house has three bedrooms and is ideal for a family.

It has a large living room to the front giving owners surveillance of the street outside. There is a large master bedroom upstairs, a twin room and a single room. The storage is split between the two bedrooms and under the stairs.
The unique selling point of this house is the facade; there are four front elevation components that allow a combination of different window arrangements to make each house different and unique.

2-compact-house.title: Compact House
2-compact-house.text: The compact home is a small house with an open plan living area down stairs and three well-proportioned bedrooms above.

3-expandable-house.title: Expandable House
text: The expandable home grows as you and your family evolves.
All these homes start life as a simple two bedroom house but then increase as you and your family change; as you save money and invest the home can expand.
This prefabricated home has four additional elements which can be joined to the standard two bed structure to result in a four bedroom home.

4-bespoke-house.title: Bespoke House
4-bespoke-house.text: The bespoke home is ideal for buyers who have a clear sense of what they want in a home. The home owner chooses elements from a selection of prefabricated parts and can arrange and organise the home to suit their needs.

5-garden-bungalow.title: Garden Bungalow
5-garden-bungalow.text: The garden home is ideal for people with accessibility issues but still desire a garden connection; with an internal courtyard and a large back garden this simple bungalow is never far away from beautiful views of nature and gardens.

7-duplex-flat.title: Duplex
text: The duplex flats are a series of two bedroom duplex apartments and one bedroom single story apartments.
The duplex homes have a large open plan living space with the bedrooms on the first floor making a beautiful home for flat shares or first time buyers
The one bed homes have a large open plan living/dining room with a storage unit separating the bedroom from the dining room creating both separate and free flowing space.
The selling point of these homes are the large windows which brings in a large amounts of natural light deep in to the heart of the home.
